list.item:
Pick-and-drop the item you want to remove in the Delete hole.
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/16x16/general_delete_icon.png For links, the associated Eiffel code will be removed from the class text. Clusters and classes will be deleted from disk!

paragraph.warning: Caution: An action that deletes one or more files or directories cannot be undone!
paragraph.tip: Tip: Turn on Automatic backups. EiffelStudio will make a copy of each class file every time a compilation is done.
